comments.creator: m_kato@ga2.so-net.ne.jp
comments.author: m_kato@ga2.so-net.ne.jp
comments.text:
The following prefs are invalid on android. helpers.* is for general UNIX platform, not Android.  Also, there is no xterm and lpr on Android.

so we should remove these from all.js

- helpers.global_mime_types_file
- helpers.global_mailcap_file
- helpers.private_mime_types_file
- helpers.private_mailcap_file
- applications.telnet
- applications.tn3270
- applications.rlogin
- applications.rlogin_with_user
- print.print_command
- print.postscript.print_command
comments.raw_text:
The following prefs are invalid on android. helpers.* is for general UNIX platform, not Android.  Also, there is no xterm and lpr on Android.

so we should remove these from all.js

- helpers.global_mime_types_file
- helpers.global_mailcap_file
- helpers.private_mime_types_file
- helpers.private_mailcap_file
- applications.telnet
- applications.tn3270
- applications.rlogin
- applications.rlogin_with_user
- print.print_command
- print.postscript.print_command
